verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lion of Judah on the throne. I shout Your name, let it be known – That You are King of Kings. You are the Prince of Peace. May Your kingdom’s reign never cease. Hail to the King, Hail to the King!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lion of Judah come to earth. I want to thank you for Your birth, For the living word, For Your death on the tree, For Your resurrection victory. Hallelujah! Hallelujah!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lion of Judah come again. Take up Your throne, Jerusalem. Bring release to this earth And the consummation Of Your kingdom’s reign — let it come. Marantha! Marantha!{/lang-eng}
